revised_title: The Micrometer Invention of Edmund Gunter and William Gascoigne
tldr: Dr. Bevis highlights the invention of the micrometer by Edmund Gunter and William Gascoigne, and their contributions to measuring small angles in astronomy. He also addresses the misattribution of the invention to French astronomers, such as M. Auzout and M. Picard, and provides evidence from Gascoigne's original letters and observations.
